definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.chinese: 赫本是他的第四任妻子。

sentences.english: Hepburn adjusts her makeup on the set of "Sabrina" 1954.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄于1954年，赫本在拍摄《龙凤配》时补妆。

sentences.english: She died in 1993 at the age of 63.
Hepburn adjusts her makeup on the set of "Sabrina, " 1954.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄于1954年，赫本在拍摄《龙凤配》时补妆。

sentences.english: ‘You know, Louise, you and I can be friends, ’ said Hepburn.
sentences.chinese: “你知道，露易莎，你和我可能做朋友，”赫本说。

sentences.english: Hepburn attends the Academy Awards ceremony in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 1975年赫本参加奥斯卡金像奖庆典。

sentences.english: Hepburns wears an evening gown in 1961.
Hepburns clothes do not often come up at auction, despite the actress hating waste.
sentences.chinese: 赫本的衣服很少拍卖，尽管赫本本人不喜欢浪费。

sentences.english: Hepburns clothes do not often come up at auction, despite the actress hating waste.
sentences.chinese: 赫本的衣服很少拍卖，尽管赫本本人不喜欢浪费。

sentences.english: Hepburn took a different line, with consultation and co-ownership.
sentences.chinese: 赫本则采取了不同的方式，他们共同协商，集体所有。

sentences.english: Hepburn practices in a dance studio, circa 1955.
sentences.chinese: 赫本在一个舞蹈室练习，大约拍摄于1955年。

sentences.english: Actress Audrey Hepburn is backlit by pattern of klieg lights in 1956.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是赫本背光所拍摄于1956年的。
